name: PRIDE - 2D Arcade Fighting Game
description:
/// EARLY ACCESS ///

BUY IT NOW AND HAVE IT FOREVER !

Dive into an alternate 80s-inspired world with an original story !

PRIDE is a classic arcade fighting game (like Street Fighter, or King of Fighters) and an homage to the classic Arcade culture.

Heavy guitars, cool melodies and devastating combos will give a fun and wild to your games !

---

This is a prototype of the game. You'll obtain access to the prototype all along the development and the soundtrack by donating to the project.

The prototype is regularly updated so don't worry if your game crashes. All forms of bug and beta testing are welcome. ;)
